thread.title: Eva
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Eva

author: Eva
title: Eva
text: I read a lot of them this one fit my budget and my work schedule to get done. After I finished the test I waited to call next week to see if the court had got the certificate. The court had gotten it and the court had sent a copy to the dmv. This was a great relive one thing off my list of things to do. This good for people who are busy with work or with live in its self.
